GTUCourses

Class GTUComputerCourse

  • java.lang.Object
    • GTUCourses.GTUComputerCourse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GTUCourses

    public class GTUComputerCourse
extends java.lang.Object
implements GTUCourses
    GTUComputerCourse holds the courses for computer engineering Helps to make operations getByCode, getByRange, listSemesterCourses etc.
